release_note: Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v1.3.7. Added support for 2FA login. PDF: Fixed text selection. Sync: Improved sync UI. Added loading state to sync modal.
New app icon! Learn more on our blog.

Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v1.3.3. Added support for the new PDF viewer on mobile. Live Preview: Reduce flickering and flashing when selecting text. Adding text to an existing file via Share menu will always append text to the end of the file. iOS: Fixed Canvas unable to drop images dragged from other apps. iPad: Fixed issue where cursor and scroll position are messed up after dismissing the keyboard via the virtual keyboard s close keyboard button. iPad: Fixed switching apps causes Obsidian to lose text focus.
Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v1.2.7. Added Bookmarks core plugin and removed Starred core plugin.

Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v1.1.16. Fixed rename file not working when the inline title is hidden. Fixed app crashing on iOS 12. Fixed show context menu command not working. Tablet: Drag n dropping ribbon icons now requires a slight delay. This fixes the issue where the ribbon would not scroll without triggering drag and drop.

Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v1.1.15. This includes support for Canvas! There is now a new Vault picker in the left sidebar. Tap on the vault name to show a list of your Obsidian vaults for faster switching. Tap Manage vaults... to open the vault setup screen. Phone only: The ribbon menu in the bottom navigation bar is now configurable. In the Appearance settings you can now manage the order of the ribbon items as well as specify a quick access ribbon item. iOS: fixed Command W closing the entire app instead of closing the current tab.

Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v1.0.3. Ribbon menu item in the mobile navbar will now open the menu on tap instead of requiring long hold. Fixed long file names or paths causes the entire view to go past the right side of the screen. Toggle sidebar commands will now pin or unpin the sidebars on mobile. Scroll position is now properly preserved when closing suggest modals. Tapping the status bar will scroll to the top of the view. Fixed graph view sometimes showing labels in a serif font. Fixed graph view keeps moving down.

Massive UI overhaul with an emphasis on making the app more responsive and mobile friendly. Includes all the new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop 1.0. Tabs can now be used on both tablets and phones. On iPhones tabs can be accessed from the navigation bar. Long press links in Live Preview to show context menu. The quick switcher now has a button to create a file matching the current input. iPhone only: Added haptic feedback for the context menu and pull down menu. New bottom navigation bar includes forward back arrows tab menu and quick access to your ribbon items. iPad only: Press and hold to drag and drop tabs. Long press on tabs and sidebar items to see the options menu. Menus and popups will now appear inline.
Fixed sync deletes new themes from desktop app Fixed sync issue with configuration files when using alongside new desktop app
Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v0.15.9. Fixed can t rename folders and files. Fixed toolbar sometimes misplaced when using external keyboard.
Fixed crash on iOS 12 and iOS 13.

Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v0.14.15. Fixed rename vault functionality gets stuck. You can now setup Obsidian Sync right from the starting screen. Fixed black bar at the bottom on iPad when using external keyboard. Tapping the three dot more options icon now brings up the menu related to this file rather than the right sidebar. You can get to the right sidebar by long holding this icon or swiping from the right. Obsidian can load all locally available fonts on your device. Long holding buttons that triggers an action like the three dot menu now triggers it after holding instead of triggering it when the finger is released. Fixed app freezing when resuming from another app when using a large vault.
Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v0.14.2. You can now share text links image and other attachments directly to the Obsidian app.

Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v0.13.33. Adapt keyboard for light mode. Fixed large PDFs not rendering. Fixed sometimes the toolbar icons renders above the toolbar. Fixed clicking on links while editing not working allow tap and hold to edit a link.

Core update: Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v0.13.24. This update also allows all new cm6 compatible plugins to run. Live Preview: While this feature works pretty well already it hasn t been fully mobile optimized so there could still be some usability issues when using with a touch only device such as editing embeds and code blocks. In the meantime feel free to use Source Mode when that happens. You can do that by long holding the 3 dot button on the top right and hitting Toggle Live Preview Source mode or run a command from the pull down menu or bottom toolbar . Vim mode: Support for vim mode is now available but must be enabled on a per device basis on mobile. It is not really usable on a mobile device without an external keyboard. Others: Drag and drop features from desktop is now generally available across the app and can be triggered by long holding items. This includes drag and drop files and folders starred items and outline items.

Includes all new functionality and bug fixes up to Obsidian Desktop v0.12.19. Improved graph view animations. Heading rename. New theme store. Slash commands. New plugin APIs now available for the latest plugins to use. Tons of bugfixes. Editor Upgrade from CodeMirror 0.18 to 0.19. Should come with many bugfixes and performance improvements. Copy and paste is now handled just like the desktop app. Drag and drop should now work properly on tablets. Obsidian Sync Fixed version history not showing size and device info. Restoring files using version history will no longer error out with This version is already the latest version . There are now commands for copying pasting and opening the context menu which can be assigned to the toolbar for convenience. The app will now wait for iCloud to sync back configuration files before opening the vault to prevent load failures.
Improved start up performance. Updated functionality to match newest desktop release.
Obsidian will now properly create the iCloud folder on first boot up. Fixed minimum iOS requirement.
